post:
Hi!

I'm not using these two servers anymore.

SYS-IP-1 is paid up to 16/04/15 and E3-SSD-3 up to 03/04/15.

Also including 15 IPs (3x /30 and 3x /32) with no renewal fee.

Server location is Europe (France, in OVH's DC RBX and SBG).

I'm letting all this go for 50 EUR.

I can only sell them in bulk since there's no way to reassign a single one to a different account.

Let me know if you're intersted.

Thanks!
